item.title: About
item.description: I believe that technology is a core aspect to move to the better world. Cloud technology has certainly fastened the rate of advancement in comparison of the years when I started to learn to code. The high demand of cloud related technology carries a lot of opportunity ranging from individual, startups and unicorns. The release of new frameworks and tooling happens almost every day. This push us a little more to catch up with technology every single day.
